definitions.definition: A mechanical device consisting of a metal box with a series of vertical slats through which material is poured and randomly divided into two samples ; this process is repeated to obtain a small representative sample of a bulk material.
A curved file used in carving wood and marble.

main_definition: A mechanical device consisting of a metal box with a series of vertical slats through which material is poured and randomly divided into two samples ; this process is repeated to obtain a small representative sample of a bulk material.
secondary_definitions: A curved file used in carving wood and marble.
